name: Super Pumpkin Bros
overview: The game is called Super Pumpkin Bros. This is an almost playable early preview of a plateformer arcade game for Amiga1200 series. The present level is "infinite" as you can never finish it. It just made to let you estimate the gameplay. The aim of the level is to switch all the red modules to green and collect a predefined appropriate number of falling hearts. If you let a heart touch the ground you will lose a life. If you let an zombie worker touch you, you will lose a life. If you let a bullettouch you, you will lose a life, If you play too much videos game, you will lose your mind (cheasy!).
